sect1.title: Installing Tar-&tar-version;
sect1.para: The Tar package contains an archiving program.
For its installation Tar depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Gettext, Glibc, Grep, Make, Sed.

sect2.title: Installation of Tar
sect2.para: To have the results tested, issue: make check.

sect2.title: Short descriptions
sect2.para: rmt is used to remotely manipulate a magnetic tape drive, through an interprocess communication connection.
tar is used to create and extract files from archives, also known as tarballs.
